lyrics:
16 contributorslove lost lyricsverse 1
our love was lost
but now weve found it
our love was lost oh lost
and hope was gone
our love was lost
but now weve found it
and if you flash your heart oh heart
i wont deny it

chorus
i promise
i promise

verse 2
your walls are up
too cold to touch it
your walls are up oh up
too high to climb
i know its hard
but i can still hear it beating
so if you flash your heart
i wont mistreat it

chorus
i promise
i promise
i promise
see the temper trap liveget tickets as low as 210you might also likebridge
our love was lost
in the rubble are all the things
that youve youve been dreaming of
keep me in mind
when youre ready
i am here to take you every time

outro
oh our love was lost
lost lost lost lost lost lost
our love was lost
but now its found4embed
